message: I'd like to offer you a great deal on this product, but I need to make a profit, so I'm thinking of selling it to you for $14,000.
That's a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go above $9,000.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate you coming down, but $11,000 is still a bit steep for me.  How about we split the difference at $10,000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11,000, but I'm willing to meet you at $10,500. It's the best I can do.
